pr_title: Improve error messages on bad [format] and [null_value] params for date mapper

timeline.message: Improve error messages on bad [format] and [null_value] params for date mapper

timeline.bodyText: Small comment, maybe we should scope the try/ catch down to avoid rewrapping an IllegalArgumentException from the constructor call ? It doesn't seem like a concern for this specific constructor, but seems like good practice.
timeline.author: jtibshirani

timeline.bodyText:
Small comment, catch is usually on same line as previous brace.
Not relevant for this PR, but reading this made me notice that we parse null_value dates different from ones that appear in documents. Specifically, I wonder why we don't use DateFieldType#parse here ?
timeline.author: jtibshirani
